data.eml:eml: The Vespinae of North America (Vespidae, Hymenoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kimsey, Lynn S., Carpenter, James M. (2012): The Vespinae of North America (Vespidae, Hymenoptera). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 28: 37-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3514, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3514
